word_mean: 梦中剧情：梦境剧情化或动作化，梦境行为的一部分，此时梦的明显内容是动作或情景

sentence.Network_en: The third chapter analyses the relation between dramatization and impersonal lyricism.
sentence.Network_cn: 第三章分析戏剧化与“非个人化抒情”的关系.

sentence.Network_en: In the conclusion, the inadequacy of poetic dramatization is pointed out.
sentence.Network_cn: 在结语中指出诗歌戏剧化的一点不足.

sentence.Network_en: Work with a group and create a dramatization that shows bullying.
sentence.Network_cn: 和一个团体的工作并且创作一个表现威胁的戏剧.

entry.tran: 将(书或故事)改编成剧本;将…搬上舞台(或银幕);用戏剧形式表现
entry.def: If a book or story is dramatized, it is written or presented as a play, film, or television drama.

example.ex: ...an incident later dramatized in the movie 'The Right Stuff'.
example.tran: 后来被改编成电影《太空先锋》的事件

entry.tran: 使戏剧化;戏剧性地表现;夸张
entry.def: If you say that someone dramatizes a situation or event, you mean that they try to make it seem more serious, more important, or more exciting than it really is.

example.ex: They have a tendency to show off, to dramatize almost every situation.
example.tran: 他们爱炫耀，几乎对每种情况都添油加醋。

entry.tran: 使引人注目;使扣人心弦
entry.def: If something that happens or is done dramatizes a situation, it focuses people's attention on the situation in a dramatic way.

example.ex: More than 400 exiles were on a dawn-to-dusk hunger strike to dramatize their plight...
example.tran: 400 多名流亡者举行从早到晚的绝食抗议来让人们关注他们的苦难。

example.ex: The need for change has been dramatized by plummeting bank profits.
example.tran: 改革的必要性由于银行利润的暴跌而凸显。

sentences.sentence: "the play was a dramatization of a short story"

auth_sentence.content: His success rests on his frank, often disquieting dramatization of recent life in South Africa.
auth_sentence.res_content: His success rests on his frank, often disquieting dramatization of recent life in South Africa.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His success rests on his frank, often disquieting dramatization of recent life in South Africa.
